column4: any idea about what the problem might be why I can't get this to work in Feisty?
not sure. Last time I messed with the logo in the top-left corner was even further back than Dapper...
is it possible that since Feisty ships with the Human theme by default that I need to modify the icons in the Human directory?
possibly, but I'm not sure. I know that changing from the Human icons doesn't change the topleft icon. (I can't stand Human, parts of it are unusable...)
